title: Bulbagarden
description: The ultimate Pokémon portal featuring the latest news, forums, community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia and much more.

title: Doom Wiki
description: The Doom Wiki is an extensive community effort to document everything related to id Software's masterpiece games Doom and Doom II, other games based on the Doom engine, Doom 3, Doom (2016), Doom Eternal, and more.

title: The Fallout Wiki
description: The Fallout Wiki is dedicated to documenting and celebrating all aspects of the Fallout series, including games, community, media, and mods.

title: Halopedia
description: The Halo encyclopedia and definitive source for Halo information that anyone can edit.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia
description: JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia is a wiki dedicated to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure written and illustrated by Hirohiko Araki.

title: Koei Tecmo Wiki
description: The Koei Tecmo Wiki is an independent wiki dedicated to covering everything related to Koei Tecmo. Whether it's games, merchandise, events, or even personnel, the wiki is bound to have information on them.

title: Mystery Dungeon Franchise Wiki
description: The Mystery Dungeon Franchise Wiki (MDFW) is the Library of Alexandria for everything Mystery Dungeon related.

title: The Obey Me Wiki
description: The Obey Me Wiki is all about the demon-romancing mobile games Obey Me! and Obey Me! Nightbringer made by NTT Solmare.

title: SEIWA
description: The Square Enix Independent Wiki Alliance, or SEIWA for short, is a group of wikis centered around Square Enix's many franchises.

title: The Wiki Ends with You (TWEWY)
description: The Wiki Ends with You has been dedicated to documenting Square Enix's The World Ends with You series since it was founded on Wikia (now Fandom) in 2008. The Wiki became independent on July 27th, 2024, the 17th anniversary of the series.

title: Wikifang
description: Wikifang is an independent wiki on the chain of Smilesoft games, namely the Keitai Denjuu Telefang series, the GachaSta! Dino Device series, and Network Adventure Bugsite.

title: Wikimon
description: The free Digimon online encyclopedia that anyone can read and help edit. Wikimon is the best resource for Digimon info since December 2005—over fifteen years of pure Digimon goodness!

title: Wikisimpsons
description: Wikisimpsons is an encyclopedic wiki that contains information regarding the The Simpsons episodes, comic books and other media, including characters, locations and more.

title: Witch Hat Atelier Wiki
description: Welcome to the Independent Witch Hat Atelier Wiki! A Wiki dedicated to the universe of the Witch Hat Atelier (Tongari Boushi no Atorie) and Kitchen of Witch Hat (Tongari Boushi no Kitchen) manga series, written and drawn by Kamome Shirahama.

title: Zelda Chaos
description: Zelda Chaos is the top resource for all things exploitable in Zelda.
